entry.title: Demo Reels
entry.content:
Musical Storytelling

A curated selection of original scores exploring the intersection of organic performance and electronic textures. Each piece is crafted to serve the narrative, shifting from intimate character studies to expansive, world-building themes.

DEMO YOUTUBE LINK

Tactile Environments

An exploration of immersive soundscapes and interactive audio. By blending hand-crafted foley with a systems-oriented perspective, these clips demonstrate how sound functions as a living, reactive extension of the visual experience.

DEMO YOUTUBE LINK
